meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I interlent my friend a book.

meanings.sent3: The cat interlent the dog its favorite toy.

meanings.definition: Lent or borrowed between two parties.
meanings.sent1: The interlent of the pen was agreed upon by both friends.
meanings.sent2: She returned the interlent of the umbrella to her colleague.
meanings.sent3: The interlent of the car caused a funny mix-up at the party.

meanings.sent5: The interlent of trust between them was strong and unbreakable.
